entries.journal_entry_description: The Rebels have captured sensor arrays that the Empire has placed around Restuss. Your orders are to re-capture one of them. With your profession skills, you're especially suited for this kind of mission.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Your orders are to capture one of the stolen sensor arrays in Restuss.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: You've re-captured one of the Imperial sensor arrays in Restuss and should return to Captain Exov.
